sense.name: time to come
sense.commentary: hereafter, futurity - the time yet to come
sense.examples: In the future we will drive flying cars. What will you do in the future.

sense.name: verb tense
sense.commentary: a verb tense that expresses actions or states in the future
sense.examples: The paper was written in future tense.

sense.name: commodities
sense.commentary: bulk commodities bought or sold at an agreed price for delivery at a specified future date
sense.examples: He made his living trading in futures.

sense.name: personal time to come
sense.commentary: a time yet to come for a specific person (usually possessive)
sense.examples: My future is bright. What will you do with your future?
